snippet: The major indexes dropped after the release of a weak jobs report but gradually recovered, with nominal highs for the Dow and the S.& P.
abstract: Tepid job report barely affects summer stock market rally; Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index ends week 1 percent higher after breaking through 1,700 points for the first time; Dow Jones industrial average rose 0.6 percent and is on streak of six weekly gains.
lead_paragraph: The major indexes dropped after the release of a weak jobs report but gradually recovered, with nominal highs for the Dow and the S.& P.

headline.main: After a Sour Note on Jobs, Investors Pick Up the Beat
headline.print_headline: After a Sour Note on Jobs, Investors Pick Up the Beat
